long_description: Featuring a swivel function and a large, backlighted digital display, the SKS Airchecker Digital pressure gauge is always easy to read. Airchecker Digital display can be switched from bars to PSI. Reduction button allows the pressure to be regulated exactly to 1. Revolving head fits both Presta and Schrader valve stems.
short_description: Featuring a swivel function and a large, backlighted digital display, the SKS Airchecker Digital pressure gauge is always easy to read.
